description:
This service is available to all members who use Golden 1 Online℠. With the Golden 1 Mobile app, you can use your iPhone® or iPod touch® to easily and securely:

- Check your balance 
- Deposit checks 
- Pay your bills 
- Pay other people using Popmoney® personal payment service
- Transfer funds 
- Find nearby Golden 1 ATM or branch locations

It's easy, fast, and convenient. Get started by enrolling and downloading our mobile app today. Sign on to the app using the same credentials you use to access Golden 1 Online. If you have not signed on to Online or Mobile Banking, you may now enroll using your mobile device. To enroll in Bill Payment and Popmoney, sign on to Golden 1 Online, select "Payments," then follow the prompts. 

To use our Mobile app, your device must meet the following requirements:

- iOS 5.0 or later
- Camera with 2.0+ megapixel resolution (to deposit checks)

USER FEEDBACK
If you would like to send us your feedback or need technical support, please email us at: mbrsvc@golden1.com.

© 2014 Golden 1 Credit Union. Federally insured by NCUA.
iPhone and iPod touch are registered trademarks of Apple Inc. Popmoney is a registered trademark of Fiserv, Inc., or its affiliates.
releaseNotes:
We've made some changes to the Golden 1 Mobile app:

- Improved design that is easier to navigate and more user-friendly 
- Enroll directly from your mobile device
- Quickly view your balances for your accounts by selecting the "Instant Balances" icon on the Sign On screen
- Stay informed and in control of your account with alerts directly from your mobile device
- Receive up-to-date push notifications even if you are not actively using the mobile app
- Schedule next day Popmoney® payments at no additional cost
- Stay in control of your account with the ability to cancel or modify pending transfers
- Instantly view balances for accounts after making a transfer
- Keep up to date with your finances with more detailed credit card account information
- Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

Please note for your added protection we have enhanced the password security on your account. Passwords are now at least six characters and require a combination of letters and numbers. Take advantage of this new security feature by logging into your online account first to update your password. After signing on using your current password, select "Self Services," then select "Change Password or User ID."
